channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Despite having already reported weeks ago the old rusty sign frame is still there., 29th June
item.description:
It's next to the pedestrian gate opposite Rising Sun Lane next to the pub,at the top of gambles lane just off the pavement of the B4362

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): B4632, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Gas or water shaft with no cover, 29th June
item.description:
Utility access point with no cover outside 32 Prestbury Rd. We've chalked some warnings around it but it's very dangerous

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 34, Prestbury Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
